name: Saint Blaise
description:
Simple game play mechanics and fast paced fun will keep you engaged as you save fellow robots, collect jewels and learn how the Robot Rebellion battled against the Ball Bot empire.

Enjoy this ad free game without any need for in app purchases, this game is 100% absolutely FREE!

This game features a delightful story, with voice acting and characters who bring to life this sci-fi saga in Story mode. Challenge your skills by attempting to get a new high score in Infinite mode.

Have a fun time collecting jewels and blasting bots in Jewel mode.

With so many enemies to fight, jewels to collect and fellow rebel robots to save, you are sure to have a BLAST!!!

We would appreciate you taking the time to rate this game and share your thoughts on it with a review.
